directions: Cream shortening with sugars.  Mix in beaten eggs.  Sift together flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon; mix into creamed mixture.  Stir in nuts and vanilla.
Make rolls about 2 inches in diameter.  Refrigerate overnight.
Slice about 3/8 inch thick, and place on greased cookie sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes.
title: Icebox Cookies II
